---
title: "UFO Sightings in `r params$state"
output: html_document
params: 
  state: "co"
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```
```{r packs, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(lubridate)
```



```{r, echo = FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
ufo_sightings <- readr::read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2019/2019-06-25/ufo_sightings.csv")
ufo_sightings_state <- ufo_sightings %>% 
  mutate(date_time = mdy_hm(date_time),
         sighting_year = year(date_time)) %>% 
  filter(state == params$state)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
ufo_sightings_state %>% 
  group_by(state) %>% 
  summarize(n_state = n()) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_col(aes(x = state, y = n_state))
```

The graph above displays the *ufo sightings* reported in `r params$state`.
